original: sde gsum smon lam grub gnyis rin chen gru char bzhugs so //
analyzed: sde gsum smon lam grub gnyis rin chen gru char bzhugs so

original: na mo gu ru ma ha ni d+hi pa da ya /
analyzed: na mo gu ru ma ha ni d+hi ba da ya

analyzed: mdzod gsum chu bo bzhi rdzogs bla ma las

original: thog mar smin byed dbang gis sa bon thebs //
analyzed: thogs mar smin byed dbang gis sa bon thebs

analyzed: dam tshhig sdom ba nyams med brgyud la brtan

analyzed: byin rlabs dbang gi nus ba gong phel shog

original: /grol byed khrid kyis gzhi lam 'bras bu'i don /
analyzed: byed khrid kyis gzhi lam bras bu don

analyzed: khong du chud cing dran shes bag yod ldan

analyzed: dwangs dod yid ches mi ldog dad ba bzung

analyzed: lus sems las rung shin sbyong mthar phyin shog

original: /bskyed pa'i rim pa rnam pa gsal ba dang // rnam dag dran cing gsal snang nga rgyal brtan //
analyzed: ba rim ba rnam ba gsal ba dang rnam dag dran cing gsal snang nga rgyal brtan

original: cho ga rang 'bras ngo bo byed las kyi /
analyzed: cho ga rang bras ngo bo byed las kyi

analyzed: khyad ba bzhi ldan skyed rim mthar phyin shog

original: /rdzogs rim mtshhan bcas mtshhan med ting nge 'dzin //
analyzed: rim mtshhan cha mtshhan med ting nge dzin

analyzed: sde gsum kun bzang yab yum sras gsum gyi

analyzed: nyams len g.yo thob goms brtan mthar phyin nas

analyzed: snang bzhi mthar phyin bras bu mngon gyur shog

analyzed: gsum zhing gi bkod ba yongs su rdzogs

analyzed: cho phrul gsum gyi chos khor rab skor nas

analyzed: khams gsum khor ba sems can bgrang ba la

analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgya phrin las lhun grub shog

analyzed: na skye dang tshhe rabs thams cad du

analyzed: yongs dzin dge ba bshes kyis rjes su gzung

analyzed: shu mang+ga
